title: [1.7.10~?][搬运]龙之领域-DragonRealm[尝尝龙的力量吧!]23号更新1.2a版本
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2429058229 于 2016-8-28 15:10 编辑 





)JTV2R`0G${3G`LZB@QCXIR.png (88.48 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

2016-7-18 21:00 上传





· 作者更新了~！ 1.1版本在22号已经发布~·更新在8月23号1.2a版本更新:（谁都不会想看的更新内容）

Fixed an issue that would cause a random crash while wearing separate pieces (non full set) of Dragon Armor.
(修正了一个问题，将导致随机崩溃，而穿单独的件（非全套）的龙装甲。)


1 前言:
我随便在国外MOD论坛逛了逛(其实是专门来找新的MOD搬运到国内的=w=)发现了这一MOD，还是16号时发布的，看起来还不错，我就通知作者，搬运到国内。
2 简述:
模组添加了3种不同的龙，杀死就可以获取一些装备，分别是叫:
侦察龙  猎人龙  阿尔法龙（原谅我的渣翻译...233）


3 介绍探究ing~(暂时请看下处机翻)


4 关于:
作者暂时只是从1.7.10开始做起，预计后续会一直更新，那么我们也期待作者的更新吧~
关于搬运的问题..作者已经允许我了,貌似作者很开心...233~




H1E9AFLXQ4ILJ8}CHAJL~7Q.png (21.02 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2016-7-19 11:37 上传




file:///C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\Tencent\Users\2429058229\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\H1E9AFLXQ4ILJ8}CHAJL~7Q.png
作者的原文:Have you ever wished that EnderDragons were stronger?  Have you ever played on a server where someone had already slain the EnderDragon before you had a chance to slay it yourself?  Have you wondered what the Overworld would be like with Dragons roaming the skies?  If so, then this is the mod for you! DragonRealm adds three unique Dragons, each with different attack and health values, that will spawn in all dimensions.  Each dragon can have their attack/health values customizable in the config file.  Dragons do NOT cause damage to blocks and cannot clip through them either.  This mod also includes three armor sets with unique abilities that will help you on your way to conquer Minecraft! I hope you enjoy this mod and wish you the best of luck on your quest to slay all dragons!   - Dragons -Scout Dragon:  This is the weakest of the dragons and will avoid all players wearing a full set of Alpha Dragon armor.Hunter Dragon:  This is your average dragon that will offer quite a challenge to most players.  This dragon will also avoid players wearing a full set of Alpha Dragon armor.Alpha Dragon:  This is the strongest of all dragons and will strike fear in almost all players!  This dragon will not fly from players wearing a full set of armor, so a "fight or flight" tactic will be required.
 - Armor -Scout Dragon Armor:  This armor offers slightly better durability than Diamond Armor and has the enchantability of Gold Armor.  A full set of this armor provides Night Vision, Fire Resistance I, and Resistance I and the special ability of a random dragon shout on attack.Hunter Dragon Armor:  This armor offers even greater durability than Diamond Armor and also has the enchantability of Gold Armor.  A full set of this armor provides Night Vision, Fire Resistance I, Resistance II, and Strength I, the special ability of a random dragon shout on attack, and Area of Affect damage to nearby hostile mobs.Alpha Dragon Armor:  This armor offers the highest level of durability of all Dragon Armor and also has the enchantability of Gold Armor.  A full set of this armor provides Night Vision, Fire Resistance I, Resistance III, and Strength IV, the special ability of a random dragon shout on attack, and Area of Affect damage to nearby hostile mobs.
 - Crafting Items -Scout Binding Thread:   Used in crafting Scout Dragon Armor.Hunter Binding Thread:   Used in crafting Hunter Dragon Armor.Alpha Binding Thread:   Used in crafting Alpha Dragon Armor.Scout Dragon Scales:  Used in crafting Scout Dragon Armor.Hunter Dragon Scales:  Used in crafting Hunter Dragon Armor.Alpha Dragon Scales:  Used in crafting Alpha Dragon Armor.Dragon Talon:  Used in crafting all Dragon Armor.

以下为机翻:(某些没翻译出来的,我添加进去了)

你曾经希望EnderDragons(末影龙)更强？你玩过的服务器上，有人已经被杀的enderdragon(末影龙)之前你有机会杀了自己吗？你知道世界会像龙在天空？如果是这样，那么这是为你的模组！
DragonRealm加三独特的龙，各有不同的攻击和健康的价值观，这将在所有尺寸的产卵。每一个龙可以有他们的攻击/健康值可在配置文件中自定义。龙不会对块造成伤害，也不能通过它们来剪辑。这个模型还包括三装甲集具有独特的能力，将帮助你克服Minecraft！
我希望你喜欢这个国防部，并祝你最好的运气在你的追求，杀死所有龙！
-龙—
童军龙：这是最薄弱的龙，并会避免所有的球员都穿着一套完整的阿尔法龙盔甲。
Hunter Dragon(猎人龙)：这是你的平均水平，将提供相当一个挑战，大多数球员。这条龙也将避免玩家穿上一套完整的阿尔法龙盔甲。
阿尔法龙：这是最强的所有龙，将在几乎所有玩家的恐惧！这条龙不会飞从玩家穿全套盔甲，所以一个“战斗或飞行”的战术将是必需的。
装甲—
侦察龙甲：这盔甲比钻石装甲更好的耐久性和有黄金甲的enchantability。一套完整的盔甲提供夜视，抗火我，和抵抗我和一个随机的龙攻击的特殊能力。
Hunter Dragon Armor(猎人龙的盔甲)：这个装甲提供了比钻石更大的耐久性，也有盔甲的金色盔甲的enchantability。全套盔甲提供夜视，耐火性和强度I，II，我对攻击随机龙喊的特殊能力，并影响到附近地区敌对暴徒伤害。
龙甲：这装甲阿尔法提供所有龙甲耐久性的最高水平，也有黄金甲的enchantability。全套盔甲提供夜视，耐火性和强度I，III，IV，在攻击一个随机龙喊的特殊能力，并影响到附近地区敌对暴徒伤害。
-各具特色的物品—
童军装订线：用于制作童军龙装甲。
猎人绑定线程：用于制作Hunter Dragon Armor(猎人龙的盔甲)。

阿尔法绑定线程：用于制作阿尔法龙装甲。
童军之龙尺度：用于制作童军龙装甲。
Hunter Dragon尺度：用于制作Hunter Dragon Armor(猎人龙的盔甲)。

阿尔法龙尺度：用于制作阿尔法龙装甲。
龙爪：用于制作所有龙甲。
